info.title: Actions
info.description: Actions service is used to save and retrieve the action information

x-sap-shortText: Save cloud event triggered for rules

post.description: With this method, you can create an action. You can create different type of actions: Email, In-App, HTTP/Service Integration

400.description: Action was empty/Guid not allowed during action creation

put.description: With this method, you can update certain attributes associated with action.

get.description: With this method, you can retrieve all the existing actions.

get.summary: Retrieve an action based on action guid
get.description: With this method, you can retrieve the details of a specified action.

delete.summary: Delete an action based on action guid
delete.description: With this method, you can delete an action with specific action ID.

put.description: With this method, you can update status of an event based on action event id

202.description: Received and published/Received but not published due to status

get.description: With this method, you can retrieve action events with pending/all status

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter condition to be applied; the only valid filters are all and pending,The filter operators supported are =

200.description: Received and published/ Received but not published due to status

tenant.description: To use this REST API,you need to get OAuth client credentials (client ID and secret) from SAP Cloud Platform. After that, you need to pass the obtained client credentials to the tenant-specific token endpoint to obtain an access token.
